business.headline: Union Minister Piyush Goyal addresses trade strategy at business eventCommerce Minister Piyush Goyal discusses India's trade strategy, highlighting key areas like immigration and trade laws.

Who is Asmita Patel, the 'she-wolf of stock market' under Sebi scanner?Sebi has directed Patel, her firm Asmita Patel Global School of Trading Pvt Ltd (APGSOT), and several affiliated entities to return over Rs 53 crore collected as course fees.

Hope to introduce new income tax bill in Lok Sabha next week: Nirmala SitharamanAfter introduction in the Upper House, the bill, which was approved by the Union Cabinet chaired by PM Modi, will be sent to a parliamentary standing committee for scrutiny.

Meta plans to lay off 'lowest performance' staff next week, internal memo revealsNotices will go out to employees losing their jobs starting at 5 am local time on Monday in most countries, including in the US, according to one of the posts, authored by Meta's Head of People Janelle Gale.

Cabinet clears new income tax bill, likely to be tabled in Lok Sabha Monday: SourcesThe new legislation, which is often referred to as the Direct Tax Code, is aimed at overhauling the existing tax structure, making it more streamlined and transparent.

5 things about Mohini Mohan Dutta: The man named in Ratan Tata's willWhile most anticipated that Ratan Tata's wealth would go towards philanthropy, family members, and other charitable causes, Mohini Mohan Dutta's mention in his will has surprised many.

Infosys 'forcefully' lays off 700 trainees in Mysuru: ReportMost of the affected recruits were from the engineering batch of 2022, who were onboarded after a wait of about 2.25 years, said sources.

Sensex, Nifty end lower after volatile session; FMCG, energy drag marketThe S&P BSE Sensex fell by 197.97 points to end at 77,860.19, while the NSE Nifty50 declined by 43.40 points to close at 23,559.95.

Activate UAN to avail EPFO's ELI scheme benefits before February 15. Check detailsEPFO ELI: UAN or Universal Account Number is a unique 12-digit number allotted by EPFO which is necessary for managing provident fund accounts.

RBI introduces 'bank.in' domain for Indian banks to tackle financial fraudThe move aims to tackle growing financial fraud and cybercrime, prevent malicious activities, and strengthen the country's financial ecosystem.
RBI cuts key lending rate after 5 years: 6 takeaways from the announcementThe central bank has announced a reduction in the repo rate by 25 basis points for the first time in nearly five years.
After 5 years, RBI cut key lending rate by 25 basis points to 6.25%This marks the first rate cut since 2020 and the first policy decision under Governor Malhotra's leadership.

Home loans to get cheaper as RBI cuts rates. Check detailsThe RBI MPC reduced key lending rates by 25 basis points to 6.25%, the first rate cut in nearly five years under the leadership of newly appointed RBI Governor Sanjay Malhotra.
RBI reduces key lending rate by 25 basis points to 6.25%The rate cut announced by the committee is the first since 2020. This was also the first policy meeting of Sanjay Malhotra as RBI Governor.

HDFC Bank UPI services unavailable on this date. Get details hereDuring the downtime, the UPI transactions on HDFC Bank's current and savings accounts and RuPay credit cards will be affected.

entertainment.headline: Ed Sheeran clarifies he had permission 'to busk' in Bengaluru: It wasn't randomBritish singer Ed Sheeran has shared a short statement about his street performance in Bengaluru ahead of his concert tonight in the city. The artiste shared that he had permission to perform, contrary to the reports.

Punjabi actor-singer Harrdy Sandhu briefly detained over gig permit in ChandigarhSinger Harrdy Sandhu was detained in Chandigarh on Saturday for performing live without permission. He was later released after organisers provided documents. However, the incident left the Punjabi singer upset as he didn't perform after being released.

Ed Sheeran's street performance in Bengaluru halted by police. WatchBritish singer Ed Sheeran's Bengaluru performance on Church Street was halted by the police as it was being held without prior permission.

Papon's Kaun Mera song completes 12 years: Humbled by the love it still receivesPapon's soulful track Kaun Mera from Special 26 celebrates 12 years. The song's lasting popularity highlights its emotional depth and enduring appeal in Bollywood music.

The Mehta Boys to Mrs: Top 6 OTT releases this weekThis weekend, a variety of highly anticipated South films and original titles are set to release on OTT platforms, offering viewers a diverse selection for binge-watching. Check out the list of the OTT releases of the week.

Maryade Prashne OTT release: When and where to watch the revenge dramaThe revenge family drama Maryade Prashne, which released in November last year, is now available to stream on a major OTT platform.

Bada Naam Karenge review: Sweet, familiar and full of sanskaarsReleased-Fri Feb 07, 2025Bada Naam Karenge is a classic Rajshri Productions love story with sweet romance, catchy music, and family drama. While it evokes nostalgia, its simple plot and dated gender roles may not resonate with all. Strong performances and a heartfelt message make it a warm, fulfilling watch.

From romance to revenge, K-drama star Park Hyung-sik can do it allThere are not many South Korean stars who can boast of having a diverse filmography like Park Hyung-sik. In today's installment of our Weekly K-Fix, we take a quick look at the artiste's short but illustrious career.

What makes Netflix's The Trauma Code a breakout hit surpassing Squid Game 2The Trauma Code: Heroes on Call has taken Netflix by storm, surpassing Squid Game Season 2 on the global chart. This medical drama captivates with its blend of intense medical scenarios, hospital politics, and humour, offering a fresh take on the genre.

Ram Kapoor on 55 kg weight loss: No Ozempic, just hard workRam Kapoor's 55 kg weight loss has sparked widespread speculation about the methods he used. However, Kapoor clarified on social media that his transformation was achieved through hard work and dedication, dismissing the use of shortcuts like Ozempic or surgery.

Kinda Pregnant review: Amy Schumer's comedy film barely deliversReleased-Wed Feb 05, 2025Amy Schumer returns with Kinda Pregnant, a comedy that struggles to hit the mark. Despite its premise of friendship and motherhood, it fails to offer fresh laughs or insights.

Justin Bieber, wife Hailey step out for a date amid divorce rumoursJustin and Hailey Bieber were seen enjoying a date night in New York City, countering recent divorce rumours. Despite reports of marital strain linked to Justin's legal anxieties, the couple appeared united.

general news.headline: Kejriwal should've resigned after arrest, not bail: Prashant Kishor on AAP lossSpeaking to India Today TV, Prashant Kishor called Arvind Kejriwal's decision to resign as Chief Minister after securing bail a major strategic blunder, arguing it weakened AAP's position in Delhi.

Trump doubles $10 billion suit against broadcaster over edited Kamala interviewThe updated lawsuit mentions former Vice President Kamala Harris's full interview with CBS News, with Donald Trump's legal team arguing that the media house deliberately distorted Harris's responses to make her appear more articulate and competent.

Rohit slams 76-ball hundred vs England, ends 16-month century drought in ODIsIndia captain Rohit Sharma scored a sensational 76-ball century during the second ODI against England to bounce back to form ahead of the ICC Champions Trophy. It was the second-fastest ODI ton for the India skipper.

BJP's triple-engine government in Delhi soon? All eyes on mayoral pollsAfter winning the Assembly elections, the BJP is now focusing on the Municipal Corporation of Delhi (MCD) mayoral race in April, aiming to consolidate power across municipal, state, and central levels.

Shops without shopkeepers in India, where trust is the main currencyShops without shopkeepers in Nagaland's Pfutsero run simply on trust. Managed by women farmers, these shops, bang on the highway, place trust in absolute strangers to pay for whatever they buy. A similar experiment in 15 Kerala schools has provided encouraging results. Here's why trust begets honesty, and how it can spark a chain-reaction of goodness.

sports.headline: Rohit Sharma's Ravindra Jadeja said that Rohit Sharma's stupendous century in the second ODI against England is a huge confidence booster for the skipper and the Indian team before the Champions Trophy. On Sunday, February 39, Rohit's 32nd ODI hundred powered India to a 2-0 series win with a four-wicket triumph at the Barabati Stadium in Cuttack.  Rohit smacked 119 with 12 fours and seven sixes as India tracked down a stiff target of 305 with more than five overs to spare. Jadeja said that it was only a matter of time before the Indian captain returned to his very best. Rohit also won the Player of the Match award as India followed up their stupendous performance in the T20Is with a clinical showing in the 50-over format.  "Sometimes, it just takes one or two innings to turn things around. The good thing is that, before an important tournament like the Champions Trophy, scoring a hundred is a huge boost. It's great entury before Champions Trophy big confidence booster: Ravindra Jadeja IND vs ENG: Ravindra Jadeja said that Rohit Sharma scoring a century at the Barabati Stadium in Cuttack will give the Indian team a huge confidence boost before the Champions Trophy to be held from February 19.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.
